actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stinger
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
